SEARCH
Package scs1_group1.record

Class Record

Object
Record
Direct Known Subclasses:
Appointment, AppointmentOutcomeRecord, MedicalRecord, Medicine, Prescription, ReplenishmentRequest
public abstract class Record extends Object
Represents an abstract record with a unique identifier. This class serves as a base for all records within the system, providing a globally unique identifier (ID) for each instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Record

      public Record()
      Constructs a new Record instance with a unique record ID. The record ID is generated automatically and incremented globally.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the record. This implementation returns the record ID as a string.
